description: A Czech mayor tells the BBC he fears for his life after allegations of a Russian poisoning plot.
title: Mystery 'poison plot' sends Czech mayors into hiding
title_page: Mystery 'poison plot' sends Czech mayors into hiding - BBC News
maintext: "There are things I cannot comment on. But what I can say is that both the Czech police and the secret service do have some intel that there might be a threat directly from the Russian side," he told me.
